summary: Lazarus was a man from Bethany whom Jesus brought back to life after four days, which is considered one of Jesus' miracles. This event is an important story in the Christian Bible, showing Jesus' power over death. Lazarus' name is now used in science and stories to describe things that come back to life or reappear. In the Gospel of Luke, there's another Lazarus in a parable told by Jesus.
title: Lazarus of Bethany
